post_detail.description: Saatchi and Saatchi Health challenged ClickFire Media to produce a website for Sanofi's Frontline Certifect, a medication for pets.  Certifect.com, built on Microsoft's Sharepoint platform, contains prescription information, notes on common pests to household pets, and a searchable national database of veterinarians that can prescribe Certifect. In addition, ClickFire Media designed and animated application guides, integrating them on the site for desktop and mobile use.
